title: EVELYN PERKS
short_desc: Enjoy an experience only The Evelyn can give you. The Madison Square Park area is home to many diverse dishes. Have a beautiful day in the neighborhood with a 10% off your stay and a box of gourmet chocolates upon check-in.
long_desc:
With a confluence of cultures creating unique cuisines, New York may just be the tastiest place on Earth.

As an Evelyn member, you get to experience NoMad's delectable selection when you stay with us. Enjoy 10% off your stay, and a box of gourmet chocolates upon check-in. Plus, you'll get free Wi-Fi and 2 bottles of water per night. Get the inside track on Manhattan when you stay at The Evelyn.

To earn this Members Only reward, book online or by phone at (212) 545-8000.
